column4: Hi I have been experiencing strange behavior on my Ubuntu desktop, like the wrong keys keep appearing on the screen, applications keep opening up like the calculator , could this be a hack attempt ?
possibly but I'd check my keyboard settings first to ensure it's configured correctly
ok.  well, if you're sure there has been no liquid contamination, the keyboard settings are correct, the keyboard works and is plugged in and no keys are stuck ...
happens with another keyboard then it's NOT the keyboard.
